fields.description:
The error is:

{code}
══ Failed tests ════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
── Error (test-duckdb.R:24:3): to_duckdb ───────────────────────────────────────
Error: Cannot call dataset___InMemoryDataset__create(). See https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/install.html for help installing Arrow C++ libraries. 
Backtrace:
    █
 1. └─InMemoryDataset$create(example_data) test-duckdb.R:24:2
 2.   └─arrow:::dataset___InMemoryDataset__create(x)
── Error (test-duckdb.R:66:3): summarise(..., .engine) ─────────────────────────
Error: Cannot call dataset___InMemoryDataset__create(). See https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/install.html for help installing Arrow C++ libraries. 
Backtrace:
    █
 1. └─InMemoryDataset$create(example_data) test-duckdb.R:66:2
 2.   └─arrow:::dataset___InMemoryDataset__create(x)
── Error (test-duckdb.R:97:3): Joining, auto-cleanup ───────────────────────────
Error: Cannot call dataset___InMemoryDataset__create(). See https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/install.html for help installing Arrow C++ libraries. 
Backtrace:
    █
{code}
